hero.name: Kevin Patterson
hero.content: I’m a passionate full stack developer specialized in building robust, scalable, and secure web applications. I study Cybersecurity Engineering at the University of Computer Sciences (UCI) in Havana and have 3 years of hands‑on experience with cutting‑edge technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, Django, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. I turn innovative ideas into digital solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences without compromising security.

about.text: From a very young age, I’ve been fascinated by technology and its endless possibilities. As a committed full stack developer, I combine creativity with technical expertise to design and develop high‑performance, user‑friendly web applications, always emphasizing their security. With 3 years of professional experience, I’ve honed my skills with modern tools and frameworks.

experiences.description: At UCI, I build scalable web applications using Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Nest.js, and React.js. I collaborate closely with cross‑functional teams, valuing clear communication and trust while crafting solutions that truly enhance user experience, security, and system performance.
At CITMATEL, I focused on designing and developing an Automated Web Hosting System using Next.js and React. This experience deepened my knowledge of process automation and its importance.

At UCI, I developed a Food Recipe Management web application using Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, and jQuery. I worked closely with a professional team, valuing clear communication and trust throughout the project while prioritizing user experience and security above all.

In my role at Rollo, I led software development for an Intelligent SaaS Platform for Thermal Food and Retail Labels. I enjoyed collaborating with a dedicated team, where our collective efforts made a real difference in daily operations.

Working as a freelance developer allowed me to create custom web solutions for real‑world challenges across various communities. This hands‑on experience not only strengthened my technical skills but also underscored the value of understanding and adapting to each client’s unique needs.
